participant_1.background:
My favorite tv show is game of thrones.
My favorite music genre is pop.
I enjoy home cooked meals.
I like long walks on the beach.

participant_2.background:
I decorate cakes for a living.
I am a lesbian.
I love cats.
I am slightly overweight , but my doctors say i am healthy.

content.text: I love long walks on the beach. What are your favorite things to do at the beach?
I love to swim and play in the sand. I also like to sunbathe and read a book.
That sounds nice. I also love to swim and play in the sand. I don't like to sunbathe because I get too hot.
I know what you mean. I have to be careful not to stay in the sun too long.
Me too. So, what do you like to do when you're not at the beach?
I like to decorate cakes. I'm a professional cake decorator.
Wow, that's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to decorate cakes.
It's not too hard. There are a lot of great tutorials online.
I'll have to check them out. I bet you make some amazing cakes.
Thanks! I like to think I do.
So, what kind of cakes do you like to decorate?
I like to decorate all kinds of cakes, but my favorite are probably birthday cakes.
I can imagine. Birthday cakes are always so special.
They are. I love making them for people and seeing their faces light up when they see them.
That's so sweet. You must be a really good cake decorator.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a cake decorator?
I love being able to make people happy. I also love the creativity and the challenge of coming up with new designs.
That sounds really fun. I could see myself getting into cake decorating.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express your creativity.
Thanks for the encouragement! I might just give it a try.
